response.overview: In a late-night Amsterdam kiosk, two lonely men stumble into a tense, awkward dance of curiosity and unexpected vulnerability. A simple coin toss exposes the desperate attempt to crave connection and attention, even when the means to attain it is ambiguous.  What begins as small talk develops into a tense yet humorous exchange, as each man projects his own loneliness, frustrations, and longing for attention onto the other. Inspired by WangKarWai, using the script of the Coen brothersâ€™ iconic coin-toss scene, this short film transforms a moment of chance into a portrait of two mismatched souls briefly sharing the same cramped space, before retreating back into their separate lives, unseen and unresolved.
response.title: Coin Toss
